com.bumptech.glide.load

Interface ResourceEncoder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the data contained by the resource.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Encoder<Resource<T>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitmapEncoder, GifBitmapWrapperResourceEncoder, GifResourceEncoder, NullResourceEncoder

    public interface ResourceEncoder<T>
extends Encoder<Resource<T>>
    An interface for writing data from a resource to some persistent data store (i.e. a local File cache).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bumptech.glide.load.Encoder

        encode, getId
